name: TRONIT
description:
In Tronit, you find yourself trapped inside a mine and research facility.

You are not alone however!

An evil creature, a combination of ore and metal, chases you through the depths of the mine. Evade, hide and explore to find useful Information on how to defeat this enemy.

CONTROLS:

Movement :  "WASD" + Mouse

Sprint: "SHIFT" (hold)

Hide/Crouch: "C" (toggle)

Interact: "E"
